examples: They served fresh vegetables with a side of tangy salad cream.

Education for a human being is a window to the world.
Human nature is generally of such kind that it will choose a line of least resistance if that is at all possible, and loathe exertion beyond it.
Monoclonal antibodies raised against human lymphocytes.
words.defineEn: related or belonging to people, not machines or animals
words.defineVi: liên quan hoặc thuộc về con người, không phải máy móc hoặc động vật

examples: A cure for lung cancer would save thousands of lives each year.
The upcoming election is a kill or cure moment for the future of the country.
Remember that an ill wound is cured, not an ill name.
Regular exercise and healthy eating habits can prevent many illnesses as prevention is better than cure.
Scientists are still trying to find a cure for cancer.
words.defineEn: a treatment or medication  for a certain disease or injury
words.defineVi: một phương pháp điều trị hoặc thuốc cho một số bệnh hoặc chấn thương

examples: I'll write you out a receipt.
If you bring the dress back with the receipt, you can change it.
Here's your receipt.
Then switch off read receipts.
CVS receipts are long.
words.defineEn: a written or printed document that shows a number of goods or services which are bought or delivered are paid for
words.defineVi: một tài liệu bằng văn bản hoặc in cho thấy một số hàng hóa hoặc dịch vụ được mua hoặc giao được trả tiền cho

examples: The recipe serves four people.
The recipe called for seven ingredients.
The recipe calls for thirty grams of sugar.
I never follow a recipe completely.
My favorite smoothie recipe always includes the juiciness of a Jaffa orange.
words.defineEn: the instructions on how to cook a certain food
words.defineVi: hướng dẫn cách nấu một món ăn nhất định
